trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an XML document cannot be deserialized into a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML 文档无法反序列化到时引发的异常<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>通过<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> throws this exception it supplies a message that describes the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]当<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>会引发此异常它会提供描述异常的原因的消息。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>

trans-unit.source: In some cases the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> supplies a list of validation errors and warnings that it encountered while trying to deserialize the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>提供的验证错误和它在尝试反序列化<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>时遇到的警告列表</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A> property contains this list if it is supplied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>属性包含此列表，如果已提供。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error and takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性为系统提供的消息的描述错误并将当前系统区域性考虑在内的新实例。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|A system-supplied localized description.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|系统提供的一个本地化的描述。 | |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|</xref:System.Collections.IList></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A></xref:System.Exception.Message%2A></xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 内容`message`参数旨在为人所理解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 | |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|</xref:System.Collections.IList></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A></xref:System.Exception.Message%2A></xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is supplied to the constructor or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the `innerException` parameter does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回的相同值，如果提供给构造函数或 null 引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing)`innerException`参数不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 | |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|</xref:System.Collections.IList></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A></xref:System.Exception.Message%2A></xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`参数不是 null 引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)，处理内部异常的 catch 块中引发当前异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs"></xref> associated with this exception, and additional exception information.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>对象的集合<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs"></xref>与此异常和附加异常信息相关联。

trans-unit.source: GetObjectData sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the exception object data targeted for serialization.
trans-unit.target: GetObjectData 集<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>用针对于序列化的所有异常对象数据。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization the exception object is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: 反序列化期间的异常对象重建从<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>通过流传输。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: For more information see XML and SOAP Serialization.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息请参阅 XML 和 SOAP 序列化。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>它保存关于所引发异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: info is a null reference ( in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: info为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)

trans-unit.source: Gets a list that contains validation warnings and errors associated with this exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含与此异常关联验证警告和错误的列表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> uses an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to deserialize an XML document into a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer><xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>若要反序列化将 XML 文档读入<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile></xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>使用</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> collects validation errors and warnings emitted by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>收集验证错误和受支持<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>发出的警告</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>

trans-unit.source: At certain points during deserialization, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> determines whether the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> has encountered any validation errors, and, if it has, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> adds these warnings and errors to ValidationEventArgs and throws a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化过程的某些点<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>确定是否<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>遇到了任何验证错误，并且，如果它具有，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>将这些警告和错误记录到 ValidationEventArgs 添加，并引发一种<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Not all exceptions of this class will have ValidationEventArgs set.
trans-unit.target: 此类不是所有异常都将都有 ValidationEventArgs 集。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IList> of <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs"></xref> objects that contains validation warnings and errors associated with this exception.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.IList>的<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs"></xref>包含验证警告和错误与此异常关联的对象。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty list.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空列表。
